member.name: TouchPredictionParameters
member.summary: Contains hardware input details that can be used to predict touch targets and help compensate for hardware latency when processing touch and gesture input that contains distance and velocity data.

member.name: TouchPredictionParameters.cbSize
member.summary: The size of this structure, in bytes.

member.name: TouchPredictionParameters.dwSampleTime
member.summary: Sample time in milliseconds (used to calculate velocity).

member.name: TouchPredictionParameters.bUseHWTimeStamp
member.summary: Use timestamps provided by the hardware.
